# Analysis table about the study
|     |     |
| --- | --- |
|  Researchers   | Kieran Cox  |
| Published in ? When ?    | in Environmental Science & Technology and American Scientific on the 13th of Juni 2019   |
| General topic    | Human consumption of microplastics    |
| Procedure/ what was examined    |  - Pulling together past scientific literature that calculated the number of microplastics in things we commonly consume, such as in tap and bottled water, sugars, seafood and air. - Analysing them and calculate the amount of microplastic people comsume each year  |
| Conclusion/discovery    | - Between 74,000 and 121,000 microplastic particles every year consumed by humans.  - Higher number for people drinking bottled water rather than tap water
  |
| Remaining questions    |  Is it dangerous for health ? Is all this plastic ingestion safe? Effects of the dose ? |
